messages.title: Backing the NHS
messages.content: Simon Burns has been working tirelessly to improve the NHS. The Mid Essex Hospital Services Trust has received £17.6 million to improve healthcare.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Working towards improving NHS services and securing additional funding.

mentions.candidate: Simon Burns has consistently been in touch with the community, taking concerns directly to the relevant authorities.

issues.economy: Labour's tax on jobs will kill the recovery.
issues.health: Secured £17.6 million for local hospital improvements.

politicalExperience.achievements: Simon has been working for Chelmsford, taking local concerns to the heart of government.

quotes.text: Simon Burns has consistently been in touch with the community, taking concerns directly to the relevant authorities.

images.caption: Simon Burns with healthcare workers and community.
Various images of Simon Burns engaging with the community.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Simon leading campaigns such as ‘Cleaner Hospitals’, ‘Free TV for the over 60s’, and underlining the harm of Labour’s tax plans on jobs and recovery.
